library(tidyverse)

# Make Some Vectors

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

# Check the class
class(marmots)

```

```{r echo=TRUE}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 8.5)

class(pika)

# scaler multiplier 

scaler_pika <- 5.2 * pika

scaler_pika

```

```{r}
bananas <- c(1, 2, 3)
apples <- c(6, 7, 8)

bananas + apples
bananas - apples

#dot product

bananas %*% apples
```
